article_title: What Trump and the GOP Debaters Promised for Your Wallet
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: On Thursday night, Fox News hosted the first debate in the 2016 Republican primaries. The takeaway: lower taxes, fewer regulations and a whole lot less Obamacare.
article_metadata.author: Eric Reed
